name: Meteor Attack
description:
Meteor Attack is one player game where you, the hero, must protect the earth from falling meteors. Each Level increases in difficulty whether it speeds the meteors or the amount of them that spawn all at once.

Controls are simple:

Keyboard: left and right arrow keys to move,  space bar to shoot lasers, "S" key to start game, "R" key to restart from level 1, and "0" key to restart game from the starting screen.

Controller: Left Stick to move left and right, right trigger to shoot lasers, start button to start the game, B button to restart from level 1, and Right Stick Button to restart from the Start Menu.

Difference from the full game and internal prototype consist on :

Balancing movement speed for player and meteors, Balancing difficulty in levels, adding power-ups to help the player, and background aesthetics.
